```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  comment = "#>",
  collapse = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  echo = FALSE,
  fig.width = 9,
  fig.height = 6,
  dpi = 450
)
options(scipen = 999, digits = 2)
knitr::knit_hooks$set(inline = function(x) {
      if(is.numeric(x)){
          return(prettyNum(x, big.mark=","))
      }else{
          return(x)
       }
   })
library(hoad)
library(ggplot2)
```
